controllers

Class EditorController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controllers.EditorController

  • public class EditorController
extends java.lang.Object
    Editorcontroller class that handles both the gamemodel and gameview, it acts like a controller and controls these.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private class  EditorController.EditorListener
      EditorListener class that is a actionlistener that detects jmenuitems clicks.
      private class  EditorController.FrameWindowListener
      FrameWindowListener class that listens for windowevents like open, closing, closed etc.
      private class  EditorController.ItemChangeListener
      ItemListener that listens for JComboBox item clicks.

      • deleteStory

        private void deleteStory()
        Tells the EditorModel to delete a story from database. If success then it updates the JComboBox with the new stories.

      • deleteLink

        private void deleteLink()
        Tells the EditorModel to delete a link from database. If success then it updates the JComboBox with the new stories.

      • addNewLink

        private void addNewLink()
        Tells the EditorModel to add a new link to database. If success then it updates the JComboBox with the new stories.

      • editLink

        private void editLink()
        Tells the EditorModel to edit existing link to database. If success then it updates the JComboBox with the new stories.

      • addNewStory

        private void addNewStory()
        Tells the EditorModel to add a new story to database. If success then it updates the JComboBox with the new stories.

      • editStoryBody

        private void editStoryBody()
        Tells the EditorModel to edit existing story body to database. If success then it updates the JComboBox with the new stories.

      • editStoryID

        private void editStoryID()
